detaileddescription.para: SW Unit testing is accomplished through SWATT. The test cases are based on this design, and also cover the configuration options. For details please refer the chapter Test methods for Unit test. Include own header files in the testcase file (SWATT), no stubs for data types and function prototypes. Add software requirement IDs in the testcases. Expected test coverage (100%) and type of test coverage (C1).

sect1.title: Verification by Review
sect1.para: The review is available in git. Any points linked to JIRA tickes.

sect1.title: Verification by Testing
sect1.para: The verification of the module is performed using UT with SWATT Approach. The UT verifies the implementation correctness of each function. Type of testing: Decision testing. Verification strategy is described in the test description. Each function is linked with the corresponding UT.
